allow: Bash(for f in jor3.JPG jor5.JPG jor7.JPG jor8.JPG jor9.JPG jor10.JPG)

Bash(git -c user.name="Jeffrey Adjei" -c user.email="jefferyadjei3@gmail.com" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize video, images, and UI — glass play button, faster loading

- Convert 48MB MOV to 1.9MB web-optimized MP4 for smooth streaming
- Compress large photos \(26MB → 3.2MB total\)
- Redesign video player with centered Apple-style glass play/pause on hover
- Add mute toggle button on hover
- Video autoplays on loop, muted by default
- Add async image decoding and video preload hints
- Remove unused dev-wink CSS
- Change song caption to "Written from my heart."

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c user.name="Jeffrey Adjei" -c user.email="jefferyadjei3@gmail.com" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Restore original quality video \(jorvideo.MOV\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c user.name="Jeffrey Adjei" -c user.email="jefferyadjei3@gmail.com" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
High-quality MP4 conversion with fast-start streaming

- Re-encoded with ffmpeg CRF 18 \(near visually lossless\)
- faststart flag moves metadata to front for instant playback
- H.264 + AAC for universal browser support
- 48MB MOV → 37MB MP4, quality preserved

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
